alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 19 at 3:17AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 1 inches. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 18 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST early this morning. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 11 AM this morning to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they have appropriate knowledge and gear and may want to consider alternate plans. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
